title: Imran Khan (Bollywood actor)
summary: Imran Khan (pronounced [ɪmraːn xaːn]; born Imran Pal; 13 January 1983) is an American former actor of Indian origin who worked in Hindi films.[2] He is the nephew of actor Aamir Khan and director-producer Mansoor Khan, and the grandson of director-producer Nasir Hussain. He appeared as a child artist in the films Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak (1988) and Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar (1992).
